White Natanz Granite

White Natanz Granite is a kind of white granite quarried in Iran. This stone is especially good for Exterior - Interior wall and floor applications, coluntertops, mosaic, fountains, pool and wall capping, stairs, window sills and other design projects. It also called Natanz White Granite,Natanz Uoreh Granite,Natanz Granite,Bianco Natanz Granite,Natanz Shafagh Granite . White Natanz Granite can be processed into Honed, Aged, Polished, Sawn Cut, Sanded, Rockfaced, Sandblasted, Bushhammered, Tumbled and so on.

Share to: facebook Tweet Google+ Buy Now

Data on White Natanz Granite

Name: White Natanz Granite

Catalog:Granite

Color: White

Country: Iran ( Ureh village, Natanz, Isfahan Province )

Recommended Usage: Exterior - Interior wall and floor applications, coluntertops, mosaic, fountains, pool and wall capping, stairs, window sills

Finishing Surface: Honed, Aged, Polished, Sawn Cut, Sanded, Rockfaced, Sandblasted, Bushhammered, Tumbled

Additional Names: Natanz White Granite,Natanz Uoreh Granite,Natanz Granite,Bianco Natanz Granite,Natanz Shafagh Granite

Testing

Compressive Strength: 1100 Kg/cm2

Density:2700 kg/m3

White Natanz Granite is a White Granite from Iran
